function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases within the group of contributors","Impact":"Risk of spreading diseases among the contributors","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols and regular testing for contagious diseases","Technologies":"Advanced testing methods for contagious diseases","People":"Contributors to the paper","Owner":"Health and safety department or management team"},{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases to other individuals due to interaction with contributors","Impact":"Risk of spreading diseases to a wider population","Mitigation":"Enforcing isolation and testing protocols for contributors who interact with others","Technologies":"Contact tracing and remote work technologies","People":"General public or individuals who interact with contributors","Owner":"Health authorities or public health agencies"},{"Description":"Risk of bias or conflict of interest in the research due to the financial interests of contributors","Impact":"Undermined credibility of research and recommendations","Mitigation":"Transparent disclosure of financial interests and independent verification of research findings","Technologies":"Blockchain technology for transparent record-keeping","People":"Readers, researchers, and policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions and academic journals"}]}
